subject: Sexual Health
title: Penis Size Myths
description: A 60-second lesson on Penis Size Myths.

hook.text: Myths about penis size cause enormous anxiety, yet the science shows most concerns are unfounded.

buildup.text: The average erect penis is about 5.1 inches long. Studies show most men fall within a narrow range.

discovery.text: Research consistently shows that penis size has little correlation with sexual satisfaction for partners.

twist.text: Pornography has distorted perceptions. Men who watch more porn report more anxiety about their own size.

climax.text: Sexual skill, communication, and emotional connection matter far more than anatomy for satisfaction.

punchline.text: Size anxiety is mostly myth-driven. Science says relax.

quiz.question: What does research say about penis size and partner satisfaction?
options: Size has little correlation with satisfaction
